features: Head and Shoulders Royal Oils Moisture Renewal Conditioner balances and restores scalp health* (*with regular use)
Rich and creamy formula restores moisture to hair and scalp, leaving you with touchably soft, healthy hair
Expertly designed scalp relief for natural, relaxed, kinky and coily crowns
Free of sulfates, parabens and dyes
body.description: Indulge your scalp and hair with the decadent moisture of Head & Shoulders Royal Oils Moisture Renewal Conditioner with Coconut Oil. Starting on day 1, this moisturizing formula helps balance essential scalp moisture giving you long-lasting protection.* Use it on wash days after shampooing to soak scalp in lasting moisture.* This sulfate, paraben and dye-free conditioner is the perfect way to give all natural, relaxed, kinky and coily hair types a boost of lasting nourishment and scalp protection.* Proudly recommended by My Black is Beautiful.*with regular use

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Long-lasting Scalp Relief In Every Cleanse Head and Shoulders Royal Oils believes in anointing your crown with nothing but the best. Developed for black hair by black scientists, the entire Royal Oils line includes expertly designed scalp relief for all natural, relaxed, kinky and coily crowns. The full collection helps balance natural moisture levels for healthy scalp and hair†—plus, formulated with the expertise of Head and Shoulders, you know you’re getting the best in scalp care. †with regular use Indulge in the long-lasting scalp relief and hydration† of Head and Shoulders Royal Oils Moisture Boost Shampoo with Coconut Oil. A rich, creamy lather cleanses and removes build up while providing lightweight, long-lasting hydration to scalp and hair. This balanced, moisturizing formula helps relieve itch* and retains moisture† while giving hair the hydration it needs to look and feel its most beautiful. †with regular use *associated with dandruff Give your crown the royal treatment and indulge your scalp and hair with our coconut oil formula. Formulated to help seal in scalp moisture†, the Royal Oils breakthrough formula starts working on day 1 to provide long-lasting scalp relief* and luxuriously moisturized hair. The expertly designed formula is proudly recommended by My Black is Beautiful. †with regular use *associated with dandruff

Indulge In The Rich Formula Head and Shoulders Royal Oils Moisture Boost Shampoo enriches hair with lightweight moisture and provides long-lasting odor protection. Give your crown the royal treatment and adorn it with the lavish scent of fresh coconut. Absolute care without compromise, this shampoo is free of parabens§ and dyes. Indulge your scalp and hair with our coconut oil formula for proven scalp care that helps balance and restore scalp health.† §based on P&G ingredient list †with regular use Royal Oils Moisture Boost Shampoo soaks scalp in lasting moisture†—leaving your hair looking beautiful from wash day to wash day. †with regular use

Moisture Boost Shampoo Moisture Renewal Conditioner Moisturizing Co-wash Instant Soothe Scalp Elixir Deep Moisture Masque Daily Moisture Scalp Cream Ingredient Coconut oil Coconut oil Coconut oil Cooling menthol and peppermint oil Coconut oil Coconut oil Benefit Cleanses to remove buildup from scalp and hair Restores scalp and hair moisture Gently clarifies and hydrates scalp and hair Soothes irritated scalp on contact Intensely moisturizes scalp and hair Light, absorbing formula nourishes scalp Provides long-lasting scalp relief* *associated with dandruff, with regular use ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Recommended Use First step on wash day Designed to add back moisture after shampooing Gently cleanses between deep washes In between washes when scalp is feeling irritated or dry Step 3 on wash day to add a boost of hydration to strands Use daily to nourish and protect scalp Free Of Parabens and dyes Sulfates, parabens and dyes Sulfates, parabens and dyes Sulfates, parabens, dyes and alcohol†. †contains no ethanol Sulfates, parabens and dyes Sulfates, mineral oils and dyes

FAQ What hair type is Moisture Boost Shampoo meant for? Royal Oils Moisture Boost Shampoo is designed to meet the unique needs of every natural, relaxed, kinky and coily hair type. When do I use Moisture Boost Shampoo? Moisture Boost Shampoo is designed to be step one on your wash day. To use, just wet hair, working in sections or with all of your hair as your style demands. Massage into scalp and then rinse. Repeat if a deeper clean is desired. Follow with Royal Oils Moisture Renewal Conditioner for the best hydrating results. Will this shampoo dry my hair out? No. This shampoo features a dye- and paraben-free formula that is safe on hair and can be used each and every wash day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was in search of a shampoo that does not strip my hair leaving it dry, is clean, smells nice, no extra fillers and I must tell you this checks all those and more. Leaves my hair feeling nice and smelling fresh. Keeps my scalp clean and must I say, great value for the money. This does not affect my hair the way other shampoos with all the extra fillers to. A definite must buy!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It truly does moisturize your hair and scalp. Leaves it really fresh and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s my go to conditioner for years now, works well, smells great, works well for dandruff

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great at detangling hair and leaves hair soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dandruff gone in less than a week
reviews.reviewText: Only problem I had was it makes your hair really oily but I struggle with oily hair anyways. With that being said I don't recommend long-term use with people struggling with oily hair. For dandruff it worked wonders I was shocked. I tried original Head and shoulders and other products. It got to the point where I was doing home remedies since I had dandruff for a couple of months. I gave this a shot and within two uses no itch and notice less flakes within 2 weeks completely gone no flakes at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have found this is the best shampoo out there for dry scalp. Our hairstylist warned us that products like standard Head and Shoulders create a cycle of drying out the scalp and then needed to use it again. She recommended this instead and it has worked amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I looked to see if this was concentrated bc I literally put just enough for the top of my head (then I do the bottom, it’s very long) that little amount covered all of my hair!! So this may be a little moreexpensive then I’m used to paying but it’s definitely worth it! I love this stuff and it smells good too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for itchy scalp ordering more in bigger bottle's shampoo and conditioner
I have used this conditioner for 3 weeks now and my hair absolutely loves it. It has never been softer and happier. I have tried several conditioners on my 4C hair. This one is the truth.
